name: persistent-context
description: VSCode extension that maintains persistent project code context across sessions using local markdown files
author: PiercingXX

commands.title: Teach AI Agent / Share Project Knowledge

persistentContext.storageDirectory.description: Directory to store context data (defaults to ~/.vscode-persistent-context). Each workspace gets its own subdirectory.

persistentContext.autosaveInterval.description: Autosave interval in seconds for active context updates.

persistentContext.enableChangeLogging.description: Append a short changes entry to changes.md when open files or git status change.

persistentContext.enableAutosave.description: Enable automatic periodic saving of activeContext.md.

persistentContext.aiProvider.description: AI provider to use for context summarization. 'auto' tries in order: Copilot, Ollama.

persistentContext.openaiApiKey.description: API key for OpenAI (required if using OpenAI provider).

persistentContext.anthropicApiKey.description: API key for Anthropic Claude (required if using Anthropic provider).

persistentContext.githubToken.description: GitHub token for GitHub Models API (required if using github-models provider). Can also use GITHUB_TOKEN environment variable.

persistentContext.deploymentLocation.description: Where is this project deployed? (e.g., 'server.example.com', 'localhost:3000', 'AWS EC2 i-12345').

persistentContext.deploymentAccessMethod.description: How do you access the deployment? (e.g., 'SSH', 'HTTP', 'Docker', 'Local').

persistentContext.deploymentMethod.description: How are changes deployed? (e.g., 'Direct file edit + restart', 'Git pull', 'Docker rebuild', 'CI/CD').

persistentContext.currentWorkMode.description: What mode is work in? (e.g., 'Feature Development', 'Maintenance', 'Bug Fixes', 'Testing').
